sentences: Tänaval (kasut. kellelegi saabuvate paremate aegade kohta)
context: The Estonian word 'tänaval' is an adessive case form of 'tänav' (street), meaning 'on/in/upon the street'. It's commonly used to indicate location or when talking about events happening outside on a street. In the example provided, it appears in expressions about parties coming to one's street or neighborhood.
